entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0066 Convert switch statement to switch expression generates invalid code CS8506 #75021
  • Incorrect nullability analysis #75017

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in ProjectCodeModelFactory.ProcessNextDocumentBatchAsync #75020
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert RudeEditDiagnostic to Diagnostic in EmitSolutionUpdateAsync #75013
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Field Keyword
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
